frame.name: Disgraceful_situation
frame.definition:
<def-root>An implicit cognizer judges that a particular <fen>State_of_affairs</fen> for which a <fen>Protagonist</fen> is responsible is socially unacceptable.
<ex>He called it a <t>disgraceful</t> <fex name="soa">situation</fex>. <fex name="Protagonist">INI</fex></ex>
<ex>To my mind it was undoubtedly the <fex name="deg">most utterly</fex> <t>shameful</t> <fex name="soa">act the chess world had witnessed since 1485</fex>. <fex name="Protagonist">INI</fex></ex>
<ex>It is not at all <t>shameful</t> <fex name="pro">for a man</fex> <fex name="soa">to allow himself to be ruled by others</fex>.</ex>
<ex> We are grateful to Mr. Mattick for bringing this <t>disgraceful</t> <fex name="soa">building</fex> and its vile nuisance to the attention of the Henley District . <fex name="Protagonist">INI</fex></ex>
<ex><fex name="soa">That comparison</fex> <m>is</m> <t>shameful</t> <fex name="exp">because it is comparing apples and oranges</fex>. <fex name="Protagonist">INI</fex></ex></def-root>

FE.name: State_of_affairs
FE.definition:
<def-root>The entity or event which brings disgrace upon the <fen>Protagonist</fen>.
<ex>You will soon learn the penalty for your <t>disgraceful</t> <fex name="soa">conduct</fex>. </ex></def-root>

FE.name: Protagonist
FE.definition:
<def-root>The person or organization responsible for the occurrence of the <fen>State_of_affairs</fen>.
<ex>It is <t>disgraceful</t> <fex name="pro">to our Public Works Department</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition:
<def-root>The extent to which the <fen>State_of_affairs</fen> diverges from the social norm for things of its kind.
<ex>"This is <fex name="deg">absolutely</fex> <t>disgraceful</t>," she said .</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Explanation
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Explanation</fen> denotes a proposition from which the judgment of disgrace logically follows.
<ex>And Harvard's policy is <t>shameful</t> <fex name="exp">because it insults the memory and the principles of American patriotism at the very birthplace of American patriotism</fex>. </ex></def-root>

FE.name: Judge
FE.definition: <def-root>The individual whose point of view is taken in assigning the judgment denoted by the target.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: shameful.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: worthy of or causing shame.
